topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad66af636872283f0029ae#post_55ad66af636872283f0029ae
[bq="hype"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad665563687254470022a7#post_55ad665563687254470022a7
when do we ever have arguments that are more than about weeb shit though[/bq]
Cause most of the time when it comes to other arguments one side tends to be idiots whenever it's about a lot of stuff.

We had a GMO thread and the anti-gmo side was a bunch of hippies saying we should farm our own food.

We had a vaccine argument and the anti side started spouting off that she didn't care if people died.

The religion thread started out as a massive fucking argument but eventually everyone got the arguing out of their system.

Arguments about politics aren't as popular as they used to be because republicans and democrats are so shitty that the only people that defend them anymore are the koolaid drinkers.
Political arguments nowadays: "Well Democrats suck!"  "Republicans suck!" ". . yeah" ". . yeah; they both suck" ". . yeah"
